findings.lungs: Limited assessment of the lung bases is clear.
findings.heart: The visualized heart and pericardium are unremarkable.
findings.liver: Enhances homogeneously without focal lesions or intrahepatic biliary duct dilatation.
findings.kidneys: No solid or cystic renal lesions; bilateral symmetric nephrograms noted; bilateral extrarenal pelvises without evidence of hydronephrosis.
findings.duodenum_and_small_bowel: Within normal limits without evidence of wall thickening, focal mass lesion, or obstruction.
findings.appendix: 10.6-mm retrocecal, fluid filled, blind-ending tubular structure with hyperenhancing walls, concerning for appendicitis; no extraluminal air or abscess; no appendicolith seen.
findings.colon: Within normal limits with a moderate fecal load in the rectum.
findings.bladder: Wall is mildly thickened and may be related to underdistension.
findings.osseoous_structures: No blastic or lytic lesions suspicious for malignancy.
